name: Code Cube Control
description:
Your goal is to make the blue cube reach the blue halo.

To do this, you have to give him instructions (drag and drop the top-right buttons into the beige rectangle just below).

You have 4 different instructions : 'go forward', 'wait', 'rotate',  and 'if something is here then'. For these two last, you have to specify the angle or the object and its location.

When the cube execute all the instructions of the list, he will loop and start the list again.

Once you are happy with the instructions, press the run button (on top of the screen) and look at the result ! If you don't reach the blue halo, you can restart the level by pressing the button on the left of the run button. You can also speed up the execution.

The blue cube execute instructions, but it's also the case for all other entities ! You can see the instructions for all of them, and you can modify their instructions as well ! Take benefits of that !

Have fun :)
